description: Returns the field index policies of one or more log groups. For more information about field index policies, see PutIndexPolicy. If a specified log group has a log-group level index policy, that policy is returned by this operation. If a specified log group doesn't have a log-group level index policy, but an account-wide index policy applies to it, that account-wide policy is returned by this operation. To find information about only account-level policies, use DescribeAccountPolicies instead.

parameters.name: logGroupIdentifiers
parameters.description: An array containing the name or ARN of the log group that you want to retrieve field index policies for. (string) ---

nested_items.name: indexPolicies
nested_items.description: An array containing the field index policies.

nested_items.name: logGroupIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ARN of the log group that this index policy applies to.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that this index policy was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: policyDocument
nested_items.description: The policy document for this index policy, in JSON format.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of this policy. Responses about log group-level field index policies don't have this field, because those policies don't have names.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: This field indicates whether this is an account-level index policy or an index policy that applies only to a single log group.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. The token expires after 24 hours.
